text: Se'ibora pasura rakta arau mansa allahara ocarata gai napaya, baram te'omra ocarata gai paya kerala tomalokara takbaraa. E'idarae'i te'om e'iboraka tomalokara basibhuta karai diche yate tomaloke allahara sraesthatba ghosana karaa, e'i karane ye, teraemi tomalokaka hidayata karaiche, seye tumi susambada diya satkarmaparaayana sakalaka
